372	Within	O

372	framework	O
372	of	O

372	2008-2012	O

373	Following	O
373	the	O

373	Kyoto	O

373	by	O

373	protocol	O

373	Belgian	O

374	This	O
374	implies	O
374	--	O
374	whether	O
374	or	O
374	not	O
374	one	O
374	agrees	O
374	with	O
374	it	O

374	the	O
374	Kyoto	O
374	protocol	O
374	will	O
374	become	O
374	binding	O
374	for	O
374	all	O
374	of	O
374	this	O
374	country	O
374	's	O
374	inhabitants	O
374	and	O
374	institutions	O
374	.	O

375	However	O
375	,	O
375	no	O
375	broad	O
375	social	O
375	debate	O
375	has	O
375	yet	O
375	been	O
375	conducted	O
375	on	O
375	the	O
375	crucial	S-intentional
375	question	O
375	:	O
375	How	O
375	much	O
375	should	S-intentional
375	each	O
375	sector	O
375	or	O
375	target	O
375	group	O
375	contribute	O
375	to	O
375	achieving	O
375	the	O
375	Belgian	O
375	Kyoto	O
375	standard	O
375	.	O

376	Because	O
376	this	O
376	debate	O
376	has	O
376	failed	O
376	to	O
376	take	O
376	place	O
376	,	O
376	it	O
376	is	O
376	understandable	S-knowledge
376	that	O
376	all	O
376	sectors	O
376	(	O
376	ranging	O
376	from	O
376	processing	O
376	and	O
376	manufacturing	O

376	tertiary	O

376	and	O
376	the	O

376	the	O
376	residential	O
376	sector	O
376	)	O
376	are	O
376	currently	O
376	doing	O
376	their	O
376	utmost	O
376	to	O
376	make	O
376	their	O
376	own	O
376	future	O
376	efforts	O
376	as	O
376	small	O
376	(	O
376	yet	O
376	acceptable	S-rules
376	)	O
376	as	O
376	possible	S-world
376	.	O

377	That	O
377	is	O
377	strikingly	O
377	illustrated	O
377	by	O
377	Belgian	O
377	large-scale	O
377	industry	O
377	,	O
377	which	O
377	has	O
377	made	O
377	great	O
377	efforts	O
377	over	O
377	the	O
377	past	O
377	10	O
377	years	O
377	,	O
377	over	O
377	which	O
377	energy	O
377	intensity	O
377	(	O
377	energy	O
377	use	O
377	per	O
377	unit	O
377	of	O
377	final	O
377	product	O
377	)	O
377	has	O
377	improved	O
377	considerably	O
377	.	O

378	But	O
378	a	O
378	very	O
378	considerable	O
378	increase	O
378	in	O
378	production	O
378	is	O
378	expected	S-knowledge
378	in	O
378	Belgium	O
378	over	O
378	the	O
378	next	O
378	10	O
378	years	O
378	,	O
378	so	O
378	that	O
378	(	O
378	even	O
378	with	O
378	very	O
378	efficient	O
378	processes	O
378	)	O
378	overall	O
378	carbon	O
378	dioxide	O
378	emissions	O
378	will	O
378	certainly	S-knowledge
378	rise	O
378	.	O

379	In	O
379	a	O
379	nutshell	O
379	,	O
379	benchmarking	O
379	means	O
379	that	O
379	companies	O
379	compare	O
379	their	O
379	energy	O
379	efficiency	O
379	with	O
379	that	O
379	of	O
379	similar	O
379	plants	O
379	abroad	O
379	.	O

380	In	O
380	these	O
380	covenants	O
380	,	O
380	the	O
380	companies	O
380	pledge	O
380	to	O
380	rank	O
380	among	O
380	the	O
380	world	O
380	leaders	O
380	in	O
380	energy	O
380	efficiency	O
380	by	O
380	2012	O
380	.	O

381	In	O
381	return	O
381	for	O
381	their	O
381	commitment	O
381	,	O
381	they	O
381	are	O
381	exempted	O
381	from	O
381	additional	O
381	(	O
381	Flemish	O
381	)	O
381	emission	O
381	restrictions	O
381	,	O
381	taxes	O
381	on	O
381	emissions	O
381	,	O
381	or	O
381	negotiable	O
381	emission	O
381	rights	O
381	.	O

382	However	O
382	,	O
382	this	O
382	disregards	O
382	the	O
382	fact	O
382	that	O
382	arguments	O
382	other	O
382	than	O
382	purely	O
382	financial	O
382	ones	O
382	also	O
382	play	O
382	a	O
382	part	O
382	in	O
382	the	O
382	location	O
382	decisions	O
382	of	O
382	companies	O
382	in	O
382	our	O
382	region	O
382	(	O
382	favorable	O
382	location	O
382	near	O
382	seaports	O
382	,	O
382	availability	O
382	of	O
382	know-how	O
382	,	O
382	well-educated	O
382	personnel	O
382	,	O
382	stable	O
382	political	O
382	climate	O
382	...	O
382	)	O
382	.	O

383	Those	O
383	covenants	O
383	contain	O
383	insufficient	S-intentional
383	guarantees	O
383	in	O
383	themselves	O
383	to	O
383	achieve	O
383	the	O
383	Belgian/Flemish	O
383	reduction	O
383	targets	O
383	in	O
383	an	O
383	economically	O
383	efficient	O
383	manner	O
383	.	O

384	If	O
384	it	O
384	were	O
384	to	O
384	emerge	O
384	from	O
384	the	O
384	comparison	O
384	with	O
384	domestic	O
384	and	O
384	foreign	O
384	companies	O
384	that	O
384	certain	O
384	companies	O
384	do	O
384	not	O
384	rank	O
384	among	O
384	the	O
384	world	O
384	leaders	O
384	in	O
384	energy	O
384	efficiency	O
384	,	O
384	they	O
384	would	S-world
384	have	B-rules
384	to	E-rules
384	present	O
384	a	O
384	plan	O
384	to	O
384	achieve	O
384	the	O
384	highest	O
384	energy	O
384	efficiency	O
384	on	O
384	time	O
384	(	O
384	by	O
384	2012	O
384	)	O
384	.	O

385	But	O
385	benchmarking	O
385	is	O
385	not	O
385	sufficient	S-intentional
385	from	O
385	the	O
385	viewpoint	O
385	of	O
385	economic	O
385	efficiency	O
385	(	O
385	realizing	O
385	the	O
385	Kyoto	O
385	restrictions	O
385	on	O
385	emissions	O
385	at	O
385	the	O
385	lowest	O
385	possible	S-world
385	costs	O
385	for	O
385	the	O
385	whole	O
385	of	O
385	society	O
385	)	O
385	.	O


387	As	O
387	a	O
387	result	O
387	,	O
387	the	O
387	costs	O
387	of	O
387	additional	O
387	restrictions	O
387	on	O
387	emissions	O
387	in	O
387	industry	O
387	must	S-intentional
387	be	O
387	compared	O
387	with	O
387	those	O
387	of	O
387	other	O
387	sectors	O
387	,	O
387	such	O
387	as	O
387	the	O
387	transport	O
387	sector	O
387	,	O
387	households	O
387	,	O
387	the	O
387	service	O
387	sector	O
387	,	O
387	and	O
387	so	O
387	forth	O
387	.	O

388	Benchmarking	O
388	guarantees	O
388	only	O
388	that	O
388	companies	O
388	belong	O
388	to	O
388	the	O
388	top	O
388	of	O
388	their	O
388	class	O
388	,	O
388	but	O
388	says	O
388	nothing	O
388	about	O
388	that	O
388	class	O
388	's	O
388	performance	O
388	as	O
388	compared	O
388	with	O
388	the	O
388	whole	O
388	universe	O
388	.	O

389	However	O
389	,	O
389	taking	O
389	into	O
389	account	O
389	these	O
389	external	O
389	climate	O
389	costs	O
389	is	O
389	essential	S-intentional
389	,	O
389	because	O
389	the	O
389	users	O
389	of	O
389	energy-intensive	O
389	goods	O
389	are	O
389	confronted	O
389	in	O
389	that	O
389	way	O
389	with	O
389	the	O
389	consequences	O
389	of	O
389	their	O
389	choice	O
389	of	O
389	product	O
389	.	O

390	In	O
390	that	O
390	way	O
390	,	O
390	less	O

866	And	O

867	The	O
867	1949	O
867	Geneva	O
867	Convention	O
867	specifies	O
867	that	O
867	any	O
867	belligerents	O

867	in	O

867	war	O

867	war	O

867	.	O

868	The	O
868	convention	O

868	only	O

868	belligerents	O

869	But	O
869	then	O
869	,	O
869	if	O
869	they	O
869	were	O
869	dealt	O
